name: Obligatory Dress Up Game
description: Finals are coming, and we all need something that’s a little less stressful to play. When I think about games that help me de-stress I think back to elementary school when I played dress up games for fun! And since the holidays are coming, let’s make it festive. Choose your own character and dress them up to your heart’s desire! They’ll be so many options you just won’t be able to stop!
